phrs.translation: 素炼机, 捏炼机, 均质器, 咀嚼者

sentences.sentence: Purpose: to evaluate MRI and CT diagnosis in lesions of masticator space.
sentences.translation: 目的：评价MRI和CT对咀嚼间隙病变的诊断价值。

sentences.sentence: Materials and Methods ct and MRI findings of 21 cases with diseases arising from masticator space confirmed pathologically were retrospectively studied.
sentences.translation: 资料与方法回顾分析21例经手术病理证实的咀嚼肌间隙原发病变的CT、MRI资料。

sentences.sentence: Horace Fletcher earned the nickname “The Great Masticator” by his diet of chewing food thirty thirty two times (about 100 times per minute) before swallowing.
sentences.translation: 霍勒斯·弗莱彻凭着赢得他吞下食物的咀嚼速度(大约三十三十岁之前,每分钟100次)，赢得了“最伟大的咀嚼者”称号。
